alert.note: Alert for Allendale (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 16 at 12:50PM EDT until March 16 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for portions of... Screven County in southeastern Georgia... Allendale County in southeastern South Carolina... * Until 145 PM EDT. * At 1249 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sylvania, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include: Allendale, Fairfax, Hiltonia, Sycamore, Ulmer, Seigling, Martin, Barton, Millhaven, Hilltonia, Millett, Appleton and Burtons Ferry Landing. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
